snippet: Bob Suter, a member of the "Miracle On Ice" team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1980 and the father of Minnesota Wild star Ryan Suter, died Tuesday at the age of 57....

headline.print_headline: 'Miracle On Ice' Member Bob Suter Dies
headline.main: 'Miracle On Ice' Member Bob Suter Dies

lead_paragraph: Bob Suter, a member of the "Miracle On Ice" team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1980 and the father of Minnesota Wild star Ryan Suter, died Tuesday at the age of 57.
